description: Led a team of four in the Bit n Build International Hackathon, implementing key frontend features and major backend components.
Launched an interactive portfolio with Vite and React, showcasing projects, skills, and custom Figma-inspired designs.
Created a QR generator converting URLs to downloadable images with auto-deletion.
Built secure backend with hashed login authentication, Firebase database for admin management.
Created a currency converter utilizing an API to provide real-time conversion rates across various currencies.
